title: TKT-183.7: Phase 4 — Weighted Cross-Tournament Supplement for Small-Sample Players & Stat Packs
description:
Rescoped per Founder directive (Feb 12, 2026). Original scope (integrate weights into clustering/tags) removed — clustering and tags are IPL-only by design (Constitution §8.1).

NEW SCOPE:
1. Small-Sample Player Enrichment: For players with insufficient IPL sample size (<300 balls batted, <200 balls bowled), blend weighted cross-tournament T20 stats (BBL, PSL, SA20, CPL, etc.) using Founder-approved tournament weights from TKT-187. Trust weighting determines how much non-IPL data influences player profiles.

2. Stat Pack Integration: Add weighted cross-tournament context to all 10 team stat packs. For small-sample players, show weighted composite stats alongside raw IPL numbers. For adequate-sample players, add supplementary cross-tournament validation notes (e.g. "Also dominant in SA20 [weight: 0.50]").

3. Uncapped Player Confidence Scoring: Enhance TKT-182 T20 fallback profiles with tournament quality weights — BBL stats weighted at 0.53, PSL at 0.51, etc. Give users a trust score for each uncapped player profile.

4. CricPom Feed (IDEA-002): Structure weighted data layer so CricPom can consume it directly when that work begins.

REMOVED FROM SCOPE:
- Integration into player clustering (stays pure IPL)
- Integration into player tags (stays pure IPL)

Estimated: 3-4 days. Blocked by TKT-189 (domain sanity validation).
